text: A fast, C-based utility for managing the central [bold cyan]sniper-config.json[/] file.
It allows for getting, setting, and deleting nested JSON values directly from the command line.
[green]set <category> <key> <value>[/]    Set or update a configuration value.
[green]get <category> <key>[/]            Retrieve a specific value from the configuration.
[green]delete <category> <key>[/]         Delete a key-value pair from a category.

content.text: You can access nested objects by combining the category and key with a dot. The 'key' argument will then target the key within that nested object.

text: [#] Set the default shell for the 'user' category
[#] Get the configured Python version from the 'environment' category
